send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
Send to CS for refund inquiries
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over

Don't use the word "off" when talking about promotions
dos_and_donts: Don't proactively offer to find pricing info, redirect them to the website instead
promo_and_exclusions: Do not offer a coupon to first time purchasers/subscribers. There is not an active discount code at this time. Use DCI shortcut

Nectar: Hi, this is Quinn. Thanks for stopping by! Save up to 50% on mattresses plus get free delivery (usually within a week). Sleep better and wake up energized every morning.

nectarsleep.attn.tv/aSR-g3cerCuR

Questions? Text us back!
.
Hi Quinn, how does a return work if you are unsatisfied
Template used: "What is the 365-night sleep trial?"; last updated: 2024-03-29 22:21:52.213
Template used: "Return policy"; last updated: 2024-03-29 22:22:00.975

Nectar: Good question! Nectar provides you with a full year - 365 nights - to decide if Nectar is right for you. We encourage you to take the first 30 days to get to know your new mattress, as it can take this long for your body to adjust to the support and comfort of the Nectar. Our risk free trial is about 3 times longer than the industry standard. You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://nectarsleep.attn.tv/aS912TOO0n8V/
